volunteer_experience.info:
Every month I do my part for these children. Donation or funding of charitable activities for humanitarian motives. In addition to donating cash and in-kind donations, public relations charitable donations are often used to promote charitable causes through media such as radio, television, and the press, to arouse public concern and support for charitable causes, to popularize the idea of humanitarianism and social welfare, to improve the material conditions of charitable organizations, to…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Every month I do my part for these children. Donation or funding of charitable activities for humanitarian motives. In addition to donating cash and in-kind donations, public relations charitable donations are often used to promote charitable causes through media such as radio, television, and the press, to arouse public concern and support for charitable causes, to popularize the idea of humanitarianism and social welfare, to improve the material conditions of charitable organizations, to create a favorable social environment, and to promote justice and love. Save a penny, give a love, warm the true feelings of the world.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
